text: Mitromorpha mirim is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Mitromorphidae.MolluscaBase (2018). Mitromorpha mirim Simone & Cunha, 2012. Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at: http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=714630 on 2018-02-12 ==Description== The length of the shell attains 3.4 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off Southeastern Brazil ==References== * Simone L. R. L. & Cunha C. M. (2012) Taxonomic study on the molluscs collected in Marion-Dufresne expedition (MD55) to SE Brazil: Xenophoridae, Cypraeoidea, mitriforms and Terebridae (Caenogastropoda). Zoosystema 34(4): 745–781 ==External links== * MNHN, Paris: Mitromorpha mirim (holotype) mirim Category:Gastropods described in 2012
title: Mitromorpha mirim
